Select the correct statement form following -
I. Mechanical wave can travel without a medium.
II. When a wave motion passes through a medium particle of medium only vibrate simple harmonically about their mean position.
III. Longitudinal mechanical wave can travel in solid liquid and gas medium.

Assertion (A) : It is not possible to have interference between the waves produced by two violins.
Reason (R) : For interference of two waves the phase difference between the waves must remains constant.

options.description: Assertion and reason both are correct and the reason is a correct explanation of the assertion.
Assertion and reason both are correct and the reason is not a correct explanation of the assertion.
Assertion is correct but reason is incorrect.
Assertion is incorrect but reason in correct.
